publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2932 Chris Ballance: Black Sun Over Genoa—That the Parliament congratulates Edinburgh Theatre Workshop on its forthcoming large-scale community theatre project, "Black Sun Over Genoa", which will play at the Edinburgh Festival Theatre and Glasgow Tramway in the last week of June and first week of July 2005; notes that its well researched and detailed examination of the events at the G8 summit in Genoa will portray the hope, passion, ideals and dedication of G8 protestors as a constructive contribution to the G8 debate, as well as providing G8 visitors to Edinburgh with an excellent and thoughtful evening’s entertainment, and welcomes to Edinburgh, Haidi Giuliani, the mother of the Italian protestor killed by police in Genoa, who will be attending the play.

S2M-2932 Chris Ballance: Black Sun Over Genoa—That the Parliament congratulates Edinburgh Theatre Workshop on its forthcoming large-scale community theatre project, “Black Sun Over Genoa”, which will play at the Edinburgh Festival Theatre and Glasgow Tramway in the last week of June and first week of July 2005; notes that its well researched and detailed examination of the events at the G8 summit in Genoa will portray the hope, passion, ideals and dedication of G8 protestors as a constructive contribution to the G8 debate, as well as providing G8 visitors to Edinburgh with an excellent and thoughtful evening’s entertainment, and welcomes to Edinburgh, Haidi Giuliani, the mother of the Italian protestor killed by police in Genoa, who will be attending the play.
